name: HTML    CSS  JS
paragraph: I developed my proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript through Elzero Web School, where I successfully completed all the tasks and challenges associated with the course. I covered a wide range of topics including semantic HTML, CSS Flexbox, Grid layouts, Responsive Design, and advanced JavaScript concepts such as Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), JSON, AJAX, and Promises.
moreinfo: View course challenges and tasks here

name: React & Tailwind CSS
paragraph: I acquired my knowledge of React and Tailwind CSS through various resources, including Scrimba, the official documentation, and freeCodeCamp. Additionally, I developed proficiency in essential libraries such as React Router for managing routing within React applications. Furthermore, I mastered Framer Motion to create animations and enhance the user interface in React.

name: Algorithms and Data structure
paragraph: I learned algorithms and data structures by studying books such as Grokking Algorithms and by solving logic problems on platforms like LeetCode and Codewars.
